slides.title: Roadtrip in Australia!
slides.body:
On February 20th, I left Paris for a working holiday visa in Australia.

I hit pause on my software engineering job, picked up a full-frame camera, and started exploring and traveling.

And also slowly started to rebuild how I create — and what I share...
slides.author: @costardrouge.jpg

slides.title: No time? Automate it.
slides.body:
Road tripping means less time to refine things.

But I still want to share happy accidents.

So I built a custom web API — it takes a p5.js sketch and assets like photos, records the frames, and gives me back a clean .mp4.

I take a picture, launch the API, and a post is ready. Simple.
slides.author: @costardrouge.jpg

slides.title: What You’ve Seen Lately?
slides.body:
The recent posts on my feed — those photo+motion clips — were all generated by this pipeline.

I’m experimenting with using my photography as the input, and p5.js code layouts as the framework.

Hahaha, I am over-engineering motion design, why can I just use TouchDesigner and Calvary ?
slides.author: @costardrouge.jpg
